meanings.definition: Emit a high-pitched sound, as of bagpipes.
meanings.sent1: The bagpipes skirls loudly at the parade.
meanings.sent2: The bagpipes always skirls beautifully during the Scottish festival.
meanings.sent3: The bagpipes skirls so much, they might wake up the whole town!
meanings.sent4: The wind skirls through the trees like a ghostly bagpipe.
meanings.sent5: The haunting skirls of the bagpipes echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: A high-pitched sound, as of bagpipes.
meanings.sent1: The skirls of the bagpipes filled the air with music.
meanings.sent2: I love the skirls of bagpipes at the Scottish celebration.
meanings.sent3: The skirls of the bagpipes made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The skirls of the bagpipes carried the emotions of the ancient tunes.
meanings.sent5: The skirls of the bagpipes were like a magical spell cast over the crowd.
